summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Police Department; authorizing the execution of an agreement with Todd Pacific Shipyards Corporation for the Seattle Police Department to help ensure the security of United States Navy vessels in temporary dry-dock by providing marine patrol law enforcement services in Elliott Bay; accepting payment when received from Todd for such services; increasing the 2002 Budget of the Police Department by making a reimbursable appropriation; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
